using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AsyncProperites.Input
{
	/// <content>
	/// Contains generated async methods
	/// </content>
	public partial class ExternalGetter
	{
		public async Task<bool> TestAsync()
		{
			if (await (AsyncProperties.GetSuccessAsync()))
			{
				return false;
			}
			return !await (AsyncProperties.GetSuccessAsync());
		}

		public async Task<string> Test2Async()
		{
			if (await (GetSuccessPropAsync()))
			{
				return null;
			}
			return "";
		}

		public Task<bool> GetSuccessPropAsync() => AsyncProperties.GetSuccessAsync();
	}
}
